flawed_nl_solution:
After going on vacation, Grandpa has 100 * 36 = <<100*36=6300>>6300 tomatoes.
So in his absence, 6300 - 36 = <<6300-36=6264>>6264 tomatoes have grown.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 6300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
